name: quotecraft
title: QuoteCraft
description: Create and format citations from web content with ease
author: frostplexx

preferences.name: includeAccessDate
preferences.title: Include Access Date
preferences.description: Include the date the page was accessed in the citation

preferences.name: useTabTitle
preferences.title: Use Tab Title
preferences.description: Use the page title instead of domain in the citation

preferences.name: quoteStyle
preferences.title: Quote Style
preferences.description: Format to use for the quoted text

preferences.name: includeTextFragment
preferences.title: Link to Quote
preferences.description: Directly link to the piece of text and highlight it when opening the source

commands.name: quote-builder
commands.title: Quote Builder
commands.description: Create a custom citation from scratch

commands.name: quote-from-browser
commands.title: Quote from Browser
commands.description: Create a citation from selected text in your browser

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
